page.title: 13FASHION AND GAMES
page.content:
The people in Langtree today wear mostly Jeans(a style of trousers), T-shirts,baggy jumpers and trainer shoes. If it is hot girls wear skirts and T-shirts or shorts and T-shirts. The shoes are usually black, grey or red and flat.The hair is mostly flicked and shortish. Cardigans are becoming more popular again.
My favourite game is Hide-and-seek. I like it because if you don't find a place to hide in 100 seconds you are a seeker. I play it a lot. I have another favourite game which is catch. I like this game because I am quite a fast runner. I play this at home and at school.
